mapper.select: SELECT account.account_id, account.nickname, account.pass, account.real_name, account.email, account.idiograph, account.sex, account.id_number, account.phone, account.province, account.city, account.image_url FROM account WHERE account.email=#{email}
mapper.insert: insert into account (nickname, email, pass, sex) values (#{nickname}, #{email}, #{pass}, #{sex})
